mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_STATUS, ALARM_STATUS, LOGIN_SIGN_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_BIRTH ) VALUES ( #{memberEmail}, #{memberPwd}, #{nickname}, #{memberPhone}, #{gender}, #{memberAddress}, #{birth} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_STATUS, ALARM_STATUS, LOGIN_SIGN_PATH FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
select count(member_no) from member where member_phone = #{phone} AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into product_cart ( member_no, options_name_no, option_quantity ) values ( #{memberNo}, #{pdOptNo}, #{pdOptQuantity} )
mapper.select: select member_no, options_name_no from product_cart where member_no = #{memberNo} and options_name_no = #{pdOptNo}

select c.options_name_no, c.option_quantity, o.product_no, o.options_name, o.options_normal_price, o.options_sale_price, p.product_name, p.product_brand, p.main_img, p.SHIPMENT_TYPE from product_cart c left join option_name o on (c.options_name_no = o.options_name_no) join product p on (o.product_no = p.product_no) where member_no = #{memberNo} and o.options_name_no = c.options_name_no and o.product_no = p.product_no and o.status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into notify ( notify_type, notify_content, notify_member_no ) values ( #{notifyType}, #{content}, #{refMemberNo} )
mapper.select: select notify_no, notify_isread, notify_type, notify_content, notify_create_at, notify_member_no from notify where notify_member_no = #{memberNo} and notify_isread = false order by notify_create_at ASC
